name: The Orb of The Uhnnahmed
description:
THE ORB OF THE UHNNAHMED
Playtest Survey: https://forms.gle/TQ3MEyYjjDoeFRVo9

Play as Gyasi, a loyal member of the pharaoh's guard and embark on a journey through the fantastical land of Khemen where trouble is brewing, Party up with friends you'll meet along the way and band together to stave off a new darkness that is spreading across the world.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move and navigate menus
Enter to select menu buttons
Left shift to sprint
